zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[短期震荡，关注支撑位]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在13.7221美元附近交易，短期内表现出一定的震荡趋势。价格在过去24小时内小幅下跌0.31%，显示出市场情绪相对谨慎。结合高点13.7626和低点13.7095，可以看出市场正在尝试寻找支撑位置。

从技术指标来看，MACD处于负值区间，这表明短期内卖压相对较大，尚未出现明显的买入信号。相对强弱指数（RSI）数据缺失，无法提供更多的超买或超卖信号。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）位于13.80106，若价格突破此水平，可能会引发短期反弹。

支撑位方面，13.7095美元为近期低点，若跌破此位，可能会加大回调风险，需密切关注。而阻力位则在13.7626美元附近，若价格突破，将可能吸引更多买盘进场。建议投资者在此区间内进行短线交易，严格设定止损，以应对市场波动带来的风险。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $13.7221, reflecting a slight decline of 0.31% over the past 24 hours. The price action has been relatively stable, with a high of $13.7626 and a low of $13.7095, indicating a tight range that suggests indecision among traders. This consolidation phase may precede a breakout or breakdown, depending on market sentiment. The overall trend appears neutral, as AVAX has not established a clear direction in recent sessions.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of a reported RSI value limits our ability to gauge overbought or oversold conditions. However, the MACD at -0.0106 suggests a potential bearish momentum, as the MACD line is below the signal line, indicating that sellers may have the upper hand in the short term. The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at $13.80106 also reinforces this bearish sentiment, as the current price is below this level, acting as a resistance barrier.

Support levels for AVAX can be identified around $13.70, where recent lows have formed. If the price breaks below this level, it may trigger further selling, potentially targeting the next support at approximately $13.50. Conversely, resistance is found at the $13.80 mark, aligning with the 20-day SMA. A confirmed breakout above this level could signal a shift in momentum, encouraging buyers to enter the market.

Traders should remain cautious in the current market environment. A close watch on price action around the identified support and resistance levels is essential. If AVAX can convincingly break above the $13.80 resistance, it may attract bullish momentum, while a fall below $13.70 could necessitate a reassessment of long positions. Given the current indicators and market behavior, a wait-and-see approach may be prudent until clearer signals emerge.
